recipesJson.name: The Ultimate PB Cookie Bar
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: This is my Take on a nice sweet authentic Peanut butter cookie bar. Flavorah caramel adds a nice honey sweetness to it. The cream fresh and Bavarian Cream give it a nice amount of dairy. The cereal 27 gives it a nice crispy ness. The Graham cracker almost adds somewhat of a Granola taste to it at this percentage. Caramel candy enhances the Peanut butter from TFA without taking over the recipe. FLV cookie dough when steeped long enough gives off a sweet honey note and adds that great cookie goodness. You canâ€™t have a perfect Peanutbutter cookie without brown sugar. . I recommend 5-7 days Steep for all ingredients to meld together. I like it sweet so I added .5% Supersweet to my mix. But this is optional. Mixed at 69/31. Enjoy.
